SOLAR PANEL CLEANING

for homes and businesses in the south bay area.

We offer professional solar panel cleaning services for your home, apartment or business.

As one of the premier window washing services in the South Bay Area, we have the necessary experience and resources to help our customers no matter their requirements. With years of experience using eco-friendly products and professional grade window cleaning tools, we ensure the beauty of your property with windows that sparkle and last.

How we clean your solar panels

We use deionized water to help with the longevity of your windows while ensuring they remain without any water stains. The water is then fed through an extended carbon fiber pole with a gentle brush cleaner. The water ensures the windows are without water stains and the brush allows us to better clean the debris off of windows without extra ware. For soaps, we use chemical free soaps which are environmentally friendly while being of the highest grade for quality cleaning. With the water-poles length, we can reach high or difficult to reach places that would otherwise need to be reached by ladder. This helps us lower risk and get the job done more efficiently. Inside your space, we use mops and squeegees. Taking care to ensure the windows are stain free. We also make sure the screens have their dust brushed off.

What we do for our customers

Rogers windows and gutters can serve a variety of customer needs, with spaces such as homes, car dealerships, apartments, businesses, and offices.
We work on windows such as store-front windows, skylights, or storm windows. If you have a need not mentioned, we pride ourselves on our flexibility and adaptation, and will find something that works best for you.

The Benefits of Solar Panel Cleaning

Preventing wear and degradation

Dirty solar panels can cause wear and degradation. Solar panels can develop staining or etching from long term exposure to dirt and debris. Regular cleanings will increase the longevity of your solar panels. Prevent the expensive and time consumption of replacement! 

Clean Panels generate more electricity

Clean solar panels allow more light to reach the photovoltaic cells, increasing energy production. In low light conditions, this becomes especially importaint. Dirty solar panels can loose as much as 20% of the generating capacity. 

Keep the Roof looking clean

Ensuring your solar panels are kept clean will create beauty and add aesthetic value to the roof or surface of your home. Clean panels are can be seen from a distance and well kept once, make your home look extra attractive!
